entries.title: AI changelog web app completed and deployed
entries.whats_new: The new web application can automatically summarize changes based on Git commits. It includes API deployment on Railway, front-end deployment on Vercel, and code cleanup.
entries.breaking_change: The application now automatically generates changelogs and summarizes changes, which may alter how users review project updates. The API and front-end are fully deployed and operational.
entries.impact: Users will now see automatically generated, summarized changelogs with less manual effort, providing quicker insights into project updates.

entries.title: Enhanced configuration options for users
entries.whats_new: Users now can configure their own Git repositories, OpenAI LLM settings, API keys, etc., enabling personalized changelog generation.
entries.breaking_change: Configuration options have been expanded, possibly affecting existing setups if they relied on default or previous configurations.
entries.impact: Users can now customize their environment for more accurate and personalized changelog summaries, streamlining integration with their repositories and AI services.

entries.title: Bug fixes and improvements on save to Git method
entries.whats_new: Fixed bugs related to saving data to Git repositories and improving the robustness of these operations.
entries.impact: User experience when saving changelogs to Git is more stable and reliable, reducing errors during the saving process.

entries.title: Caching strategy upgrade for frontend-backend communication
entries.whats_new: Introduced a JSON cache system where the backend generates cache files that the front-end loads for faster changelog rendering.
entries.breaking_change: The loading process now depends on the cached JSON files instead of real-time data, which might affect how up-to-date the changelog is unless cache is refreshed.
entries.impact: Improves speed and efficiency of changelog display, but may require manual cache updates for the latest changes.

entries.title: Changelog detail page navigation
entries.whats_new: Clicking on a specific entry now navigates directly to the detailed view of that changelog entry.
entries.breaking_change: Navigation behavior has changed to facilitate viewing detailed logs, which alters previous static layouts.
entries.impact: Users can now access detailed descriptions of individual changelog entries directly, enhancing clarity and investigation.

entries.title: Front-end UI polish and improvements
entries.whats_new: Home page decoration, loading effects, detailed page interface, and sidebar layout enhancements.
entries.breaking_change: UI layout modifications improve user experience but may affect existing user workflows or appearance if previously customized.
entries.impact: More aesthetically pleasing and functional interface, making navigation and viewing easier and more intuitive.

entries.title: Polished Sidebar and Changelog Overview page layout
entries.whats_new: Refined the Sidebar component and set up the basic structure for the ChangelogOverview page, allowing users to navigate between sections like Home, Chat, and Changelog with collapsible functionality and visual effects.
entries.impact: Improves user navigation experience with a more polished and interactive sidebar.

entries.title: Integration of JSON cache and layout adjustments
entries.whats_new: Implemented cache-based data loading method, centralized layout content, and updated iconography.
entries.breaking_change: The changelog display now relies on cached JSON files, which changes the real-time data flow and layout structure.
entries.impact: Faster load times and improved layout for users, though cache management becomes necessary to ensure accuracy.

entries.title: Optimized constants storage
entries.whats_new: Moved constant values to the 'constants/index.tsx' file for better organization.
entries.impact: Simplifies maintenance and updates to constant values within the project.

entries.title: Implemented front-end layout
entries.whats_new: Built the front-end layout including a sidebar with navigation options like Home, Chat, and Changelog, featuring hover and click effects, and the ability to collapse or expand.
entries.impact: Provides users with an intuitive interface to browse different sections easily.

entries.title: Basic backend and AI generator features
entries.whats_new: Backend API implemented with a new AI generator supporting auto-detection of breaking changes, along with additional message fields like title, impact, and news.
entries.breaking_change: The changelog generator now automatically finds breaking changes and highlights them, which could alter the way updates are summarized and presented.
entries.impact: Users benefit from more comprehensive and detailed changelog entries, with automatic identification of significant issues.

entries.title: Version upgrade to support enhanced changelog info
entries.whats_new: Updated the AI model to support entry details like title, impact, and breaking changes, and removed the previous cache system.
entries.breaking_change: This upgrade introduces a new way to generate and present changelogs, replacing previous static or less detailed methods.
entries.impact: The changelog process becomes more informative and sophisticated, assisting users in understanding the severity and scope of changes.

entries.title: Basic back-end API development
entries.whats_new: Implemented the initial backend API to support application features.
entries.impact: Enables backend operations necessary for the application's functionality.

entries.title: Project initialization
entries.whats_new: Set up the initial project structure and configuration.
entries.impact: Provides the foundational setup for ongoing development.
